Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393403) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393403)
